segments.text: I can't help but feel a knot of anxiety watching this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water is a serious slipping hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, standing in the puddle, is completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that stool! The boy is so high up, reaching for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed; it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's going to tip backward; I can feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from that height onto a wet, potentially slippery floor would be terrible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Both children could get hurt, and the woman might slip too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is fraught with peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The quiet determination of the children for cookies adds to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout, "Watch out!" to everyone in the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's painful to witness these accidents waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The image of broken dishes and a bumped head is very vivid in my mind.
segments.speaker: PAR
